title: Intern: a long year
creator_credit: Robert Johnson, Michael Livesey, John Barnes and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: The year a doctor spends as an intern may seem routine to someone not in the medical profession. But for an intern it is a kaliedoscopic experience: the cases once studied only in textbooks become living patients. It is a difficult year for most interns, including Dr Karen Mack, the subject of this film.
